description.fr: {%FightTurnEnded} <if pvm>Inflige {value:p,percent} de son {%AT} aux adversaires autour\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de chacun de vos {%SINISTRO,plural:other}.</if><if pvp>Inflige {magicalDamage:dmg} aux adversaires autour\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de chacun de vos {%SINISTRO,plural:other}.</if>
description.en: {%FightTurnEnded} <if pvm>Inflicts {value:p,percent} of {%AT} on opponents around\_<sprite name="cell_around"> each of your {%SINISTRO,plural:other}.</if><if pvp>Does {magicalDamage:dmg} to opponents around\_<sprite name="cell_around"> each of your {%SINISTRO,plural:other}.</if>
description.es: {%FightTurnEnded} <if pvm>Inflige un {value:p,percent} de su {%AT} a los adversarios de alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de cada uno de tus {%SINISTRO,plural:other}.</if><if pvp>Inflige {magicalDamage:dmg} a los adversarios de alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de cada uno de tus {%SINISTRO,plural:other}.</if>
description.de: {%FightTurnEnded}<if pvm>Verursacht bei Gegnern im Umkreis\_<sprite name="cell_around"> jedem deiner {%SINISTRO,plural:other} {value:p,percent} seines {%AT,plural:two} als Schaden.</if><if pvp>Verursacht bei Gegnern im Umkreis\_<sprite name="cell_around"> von jedem deiner {%SINISTRO,plural:other} {magicalDamage:dmg}.</if>
description.pt: {%FightTurnEnded} <if pvm>Inflige {value:p,percent} de seu {%AT} aos adversários em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de cada um dos seus {%SINISTRO,plural:other}.</if><if pvp>Inflige {magicalDamage:dmg} aos adversários em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de cada um dos seus {%SINISTRO,plural:other}.</if>

gameplayDescription.fr: {%AT}\_: Votre force brute\_! Plus vous l'améliorerez, plus vous taperez fort\_! \--- MÉCANISMES\_: Ces constructions blindées vous feront gagner du terrain\_!
gameplayDescription.en: {%AT}: Your raw strength! The more you improve it, the harder you'll hit! \--- MECHANISMS: These armored constructions will let you gain ground!
gameplayDescription.es: {%AT}: ¡Tu fuerza bruta! Cuanto más lo mejores, ¡más fuerte golpearás! \--- MECANISMOS: ¡Con estas construcciones blindadas podrás ganar terreno!
gameplayDescription.de: {%AT,plural:one}: Deine rohe Kraft! Je mehr du sie verbesserst, desto stärker schlägst du zu! \--- MECHANISMEN: Dank dieser gepanzerten Konstruktionen kannst du mehr vom Spielfeld einnehmen!
gameplayDescription.pt: {%AT}: Sua força bruta! Quanto mais você aprimorá-lo, mais fortes serão os seus golpes! \--- MECANISMOS: Estas construções blindadas vão fazer você ganhar terreno!
